arts.ttl: Vinicius, Ceballos react after Levante 1-4 Real Madrid – ‘Modric taught me how to shoot like this’
arts.sum: Real Madrid took all three points in their sixth straight La Liga game last night as they romped to a 4-1 win over Levante. Los Blancos were seemingly on song at the Ciutat de Valencia as they never really gave the hosts a way back into the game after Vinicius Jr.’s opener. arts.ttl: Real Madrid prodigy elated after scoring first goal for team vs Levante: ‘An incredible moment’
arts.sum: Real Madrid’s 4-1 win over Levante last night was highlighted by several key moments including Vinicius Jr.’s golazo and Kylian Mbappe’s brace. Also in the spotlight, however, was Franco Mastantuono who starred on the night and scored his first-ever goal for Real Madrid in a stunning manner. arts.ttl: Xabi Alonso talks Carvajal, Militao, Vinicius, Camavinga after Levante 1-4 Real Madrid
arts.sum: Real Madrid strung another consecutive win to their great run of form this season as they took home a 4-1 win over Levante on Tuesday night. The game saw the manager bring in reasonable rotations, especially with the Madrid derby just around the corner. arts.ttl: Transcript: Xabi Alonso’s Post-Match Press Conference After Real Madrid Beat Levante in La Liga
arts.sum: Xabi Alonso was pleased with the performance, but said it's just the beginning with more to come from his team. Alonso: Having quality players makes it a lot easier, as they understand the idea and what we want with little training; they are flexible, they can play not just one way but in different ways, and even in different positions.

arts.ttl: European football: Vinicíus and Mbappé lead Real Madrid in rout of Levante
arts.sum: Both players on target in 4-1 win for La Liga leaders Nkunku strikes as Milan sink Lecce in Coppa Italia Real Madrid maintained their flawless start to the Spanish league season with a swashbuckling 4-1 victory at Levante on Tuesday. Vinícius Júnior orchestrated the visitors’ first-half display before Kylian Mbappe’s second-half double, including a penalty, sealed a comprehensive win. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Levante 1-4 Real Madrid: Report & Full Match Highlights as Mbappe Stays Hot
arts.sum: Seven minutes before half-time, Real Madrid doubled their lead thanks to Franco Mastantuono's first goal for the club. Despite all the possession falling to Real Madrid, it was Levante with the first big chance, when poor defending gifted an opportunity to Ivan Romero, who pulled his shot just past the far post.
